name: Quantum Asteroid Miner
description:
You are an miner in a quantum asteroid field. Use your plasma torch to detroy asteroids or reveal them to be monsters. All asteroids are potentially monsters and only by interacting with them can you determine if they are harmless rocks or not. Change the color of your beam to manipulated the likelihood of of certain asteroids turning into monsters.

WASD + mouse (movement, left mouse key, scrollwheel)
